name: Historic Downtown Adventure
title: The Lost Merchant's Tale
description: Explore the historic downtown area to uncover the story of a mysterious 19th-century merchant and their hidden legacy.

locations.name: Old Town Square
locations.hint: Where citizens once gathered to hear important announcements, a clock still keeps ancient time.

locations.name: Merchant's Building
locations.hint: Look for the building with iron shutters and a date stone from 1875.

locations.name: Harbor District
locations.hint: The old lighthouse holds more secrets than it shows.

clues.text: I have four faces but cannot see, I have hands but cannot feel, I tell stories of what used to be. What am I?
Behind these iron wings, numbers tell a tale. Find the sum of the building's birth year.
Count the steps to reach the light, divide by compass points, what number comes to sight?

name: Campus Mystery
title: The Professor's Puzzle
description: A beloved professor has left a series of intellectual challenges across campus. Solve them to unlock a special message.

locations.name: Library Reading Room
locations.hint: Search among the oldest books in the reference section.

locations.name: Physics Building
locations.hint: The pendulum holds the key to time.

locations.name: Botanical Gardens
locations.hint: Count the rings of knowledge in the oldest tree.

clues.text: First edition dates hold the key. Add the last two digits of each year you see.
The pendulum swings in perfect time, every tenth swing reveals the rhyme.
Ancient guardian of botanical lore, my rings tell stories of years before.

name: Park Adventure
title: Nature's Secret Code
description: A family-friendly adventure through the city park, discovering nature's hidden patterns and secrets.

locations.name: Duck Pond
locations.hint: Watch the pattern of the fountain's spray.

locations.name: Butterfly Garden
locations.hint: Count the colors in the rainbow bed of flowers.

locations.name: Ancient Oak
locations.hint: Look for the plaque that tells a story.

clues.text: Water dances in the air, count the spurts with special care.
Colors of the rainbow bright, in these flowers take delight.
How many acorns can you spot on the memorial plaque?
